description: This Java source file defines a REST controller named ProductController for managing products via HTTP endpoints. It provides CRUD operations such as creating, retrieving, updating, and deleting products, annotated for Swagger API documentation. The controller interacts with a ProductService and handles requests with JSON payloads, returning appropriate HTTP responses.

classes.name: ProductController
classes.description: REST API controller for product management, providing endpoints for creating, retrieving, updating, and deleting products.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Handles POST requests to create a new product. Validates request payload and returns created ProductResponse with HTTP 201 status.

methods.name: getById
methods.description: Handles GET requests to retrieve a product by its ID. Returns ProductResponse with HTTP 200 status.

methods.name: getAll
methods.description: Handles GET requests to list all products. Returns list of ProductResponse with HTTP 200 status.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Handles PUT requests to update an existing product by ID. Validates request payload and returns updated ProductResponse.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Handles DELETE requests to remove a product by ID. Responds with HTTP 204 No Content.
